units.name: Bulwark
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. If an enemy is adjacent, attack them.

units.name: Weaver
units.prompt: Trap the paths enemies must take to reach your backline. Stay at medium range. Use pulse on clustered enemies. Denial blocks adjacent threats.

units.name: Patch
units.prompt: Prioritize healing the lowest HP ally. Position safely behind your sentinel. Use overclock on allies who can do the most with an extra action.

player.placementPrompt: Place aggressive units forward on one flank. Support units behind and toward center.

units.name: Lifeline
units.prompt: Keep your frontliner alive with patch. Stay behind them for cover. Overclock your striker or specter when no healing is needed.

units.name: Hawk
units.prompt: Stay at maximum range. Use precision_shot on the most wounded enemy to secure kills. If no one is wounded, target the enemy medic. Never move adjacent to enemies.

units.name: Seer
units.prompt: Scan priority targets each turn to reveal their strategy. Use recalibrate on your damage dealer to boost effectiveness. Stay behind allies and maintain range. Never get adjacent to enemy vectors.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.
